sqlMap.update: update etop5.dbo.tb_audit_ranking set dept_id=#dept_id#, gl=#gl#, begin_month=#begin_month#, end_month=#end_month#, kpi_1=#kpi_1#, kpi_2=#kpi_2#, kpi_3=#kpi_3#, kpi_4=#kpi_4#, over_all=#over_all#, operater=#operater#, update_date=getdate() where id = #id#

update etop5.dbo.tb_audit_ranking_header set type=#type#, begin_month=#begin_month#, end_month=#end_month#, header_1=#header_1#, header_2=#header_2#, header_3=#header_3#, header_4=#header_4#, operater=#operater#, update_date=getdate() where id = #id#
